us.phonetic: /adj., v. ˈkɑmpaʊnd, kəmˈpaʊnd; n. ˈkɑmpaʊnd/, (adj. kom′pound, kom pound′; n. kom′pound; v. kəm pound′, kom′pound)

example.eg: I made this new dessert using a compound of my two favorite brownie recipes.
example.egtrans: 我综合了我最喜爱的两种布朗尼蛋糕的菜谱，制作了这道全新的点心。

example.eg: Plastics are compounds containing long chains of carbon atoms.
example.egtrans: 塑料是含有长链碳原子的化合物。

example.eg: The military compound was heavily guarded.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 场地, 营地, 处所

example.eg: A fly's compound eyes can see in all directions.
example.egtrans: 一只苍蝇的复眼能全方位地观察周遭。

dsense.name: compound
dsense.guideword: (word: made up of two words) (单词)

example.eg: The illness only compounded his health problems.
example.egtrans: 他生了这个病，健康更成问题了。

example.eg: The bank compounds the interest daily.
example.egtrans: 银行逐日以复利计算利息。

us.phonetic: /adj., v. ˈkɑmpaʊnd, kəmˈpaʊnd; n. ˈkɑmpaʊnd/, (adj. kom′pound, kom pound′; n. kom′pound; v. kəm pound′, kom′pound)

example.eg: The students learned how to calculate compound interest.
example.egtrans: 学生们学会了如何计算复利。

example.eg: This tool is a compound and can be used in all kinds of tasks.
example.egtrans: 这个是多功能工具，可以用来完成各种任务。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 多用途的物体, 多功能的东西

example.eg: There are a lot of compounds on this week's spelling list.
example.egtrans: 这周的拼写清单中有许多复合词。

example.eg: In many Romance languages, the perfect tense is a compound.
example.egtrans: 有许多日耳曼语言都使用复合词来表达现在完成时。

example.eg: The time in which a waltz is written is a compound, with three beats to the bar.
example.egtrans: 谱写华尔兹时用的拍子是复拍，每小节有三拍。

example.eg: A fruit formed of several different parts to form a whole is called a compound.
example.egtrans: 由数个不同部分构成整体的果实叫复果。

example.eg: Various materials are compounded in the making of plastics.
Lets compound a new plan from everyone's different ideas.
The pharmacists will compound a remedy for us.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 调制, 调和, 混合

us.phonetic: /adj., v. ˈkɑmpaʊnd, kəmˈpaʊnd; n. ˈkɑmpaʊnd/, (adj. kom′pound, kom pound′; n. kom′pound; v. kəm pound′, kom′pound)

trans_examp.trans_cn: 抛光膏, 抛光化合物

example.eg: A compound fracture increases the risk of infection.
example.egtrans: 复合性骨折的感染风险更高。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 穿破性骨折, 复合性骨折

dsense.name: compound interest, compounding interest
dsense.guideword: (interest paid on top of previous) (金融)

example.eg: 'Handbag' is a compound word formed by joining 'hand' and 'bag'.
The goldsmith uses rouge to polish the silver.
